snippet: Russia made an unexpected offer late on Friday to Georgia to re-establish diplomatic relations that were severed when the neighboring countries went to war in 2008.
abstract: Russia makes an unexpected offer to Georgia to re-establish diplomatic relations that were severed when the neighboring countries went to war in 2008.
lead_paragraph: Russia made an unexpected offer late on Friday to Georgia to re-establish diplomatic relations that were severed when the neighboring countries went to war in 2008.

headline.main: Russia Offers Resumption of Relations With Georgia
headline.print_headline: Georgia Surprised By Russian Offer To Reopen Ties
